ms_copies_score: Marburg, Westdeutschbibliothek. Two copies: Mus. MSS. 2005/2, 'Quartetto no. 2...' and Mus. MSS. 2005/4
Montecatini, Venturi private collection, A.9, 'Quartetto no. 5...'
Paris, Conservatoire. Two copies: D.10757, and D.10761, '... à Mr. Dujard (?) officier de dragons'
Stockholm, Kungl. Musik Akad. Bibl., W4-R
Vienna, Bibl. Nat., S.m.3022, 'Concertino del Signor Boccariny'

first_edition.details: (Op. 1), no. 1 of Sei quartetti per due violini, alto e violoncello obbligati dedicati a veri dilettanti e conoscitori di musica, composti dall Sigr Luigi Boccherini di Lucca, opera I. Nuovamente stampati a spese di G. B. Venier à Paris. Prix 9 liv. à Paris chez M. Venier éditeur de plusieurs ouvrages de musique rue St. Thomas du Louvre vis à vis le Château d'Eau et aux adresses ordinaires. En Province chez tous les marchands de musique. APDR.
first_edition.alternate_title: Some copies have the following title: Sei Sinfonie o sia Quartetti... dedicate... musica. Opera P. Di Luigi Boccherini. Novamente stampata... ordinaires. A Lyon, Mᵉ Castau Place de la Comédie. Avec Privilége du Roy. De l'Imprimerie de Richomme.

later_editions.details: (Op. 1), no. 1 of Six quartettos for two violins, a tenor and violoncello obligato. Composed by Sigrⁿ Luigi Boccherini. opera prima. London, Printed by J. Welcker. in Gerrard Street St Ann's Soho.

(Op. 1), no. 1 of Six quatuors à deux violons, taille et basse obligés composées par Luigi Boccherini. Opera prima. A Amsterdam. Chez J. J. Hummel marchand et imprimeur de musique. Prix 5 Fl. Plate no. 136.

(Op. 1), no. 1 of Sei quartetti per due violini, alto e violoncello obbligati dedicati a veri dilettanti e conoscitori di musica composti dall. Sigr Luigi Boccherini di Lucca opera I. mis au jour par Mr Boyer. Prix 9 F. à Paris, chez Naderman, rue de Richelieu à la Clef d'or Passage du caffé de Foy. chez Madᵉ Le Menu, rue du Roule à la Clef d'or. A.P.D.R. Plate no. 515.

(Op. 1), no. 1 of Six quartettos for two violins, a tenor and violoncello obligato composed by Sigr. Luigi Boccherini. opera prima. Price 10ˢ 6ᵈ. London. Printed and sold by Preston and Son at their Wholesale Warehouses 97 Strand.

modern_edition.details: Op. 1 no. 1 (separate parts; revised by Walter Upmeyer), no. 1 in L. Boccherini Ausgewählte Streichquartette.

partial_notes: This page shows only the continuation of G. 159's source information and publication history. No other complete quartet entries are visible on this page.
